QuestData.Title: Back On Your Feet, Soldier
QuestData.Description:
I figured any soldiers we be coming across might be wantin' some revenge, so I brought along some extra weapons just in case.
See up ahead? Dem cages be full of trolls awaitin' der turn ta die. We gonna swoop in der and be da answers to der prayers!
Go and arm as many of dem as ya can, revenge gonna be sweet!
